index:
The ontologyBrowser application allows to browse the content of an OWL/RDF model.
The github repository where to look for the code is at github.com/hervegirod/ontologyBrowser.
This application allows to open a OWL/RDF model, and generate a graphML diagram compatible with the popular yEd editor.
See .
The Troubleshooting article present possible problems and their solution.
